segment.source: In an environment where securing administrative operations is important, App-V allows for secure communication between the App-V Web Management Service and the App-V Management Console.
segment.target: In an environment where securing administrative operations is important, App-V allows for secure communication between the App-V Web Management Service and the App-V Management Console.

segment.source: Because the Management Service is a Web-based application, it requires securing the App-V Management Server application on the Web server that hosts the Management Service.
segment.target: Because the Management Service is a Web-based application, it requires securing the App-V Management Server application on the Web server that hosts the Management Service.

segment.source: As shown in the following illustration, this process includes using HTTPS for communication and configuring the IIS server to allow only Windows Integrated Authentication.
segment.target: As shown in the following illustration, this process includes using HTTPS for communication and configuring the IIS server to allow only Windows Integrated Authentication.

segment.source: The App-V Web Management Service is installed as a Web-based application on IIS.
segment.target: The App-V Web Management Service is installed as a Web-based application on IIS.

segment.source: For the Web Management Service to support secure (SSL) connections between the App-V Management Console and the Web Management Service, you will need to configure the IIS server where the Web Management Service is installed and configure the App-V Management Console.
segment.target: For the Web Management Service to support secure (SSL) connections between the App-V Management Console and the Web Management Service, you will need to configure the IIS server where the Web Management Service is installed and configure the App-V Management Console.

segment.source: Configuring Certificates to Support the App-V Web Management Service
segment.target: Configuring Certificates to Support the App-V Web Management Service

segment.source: Provides helpful information about configuring certificates to support SSL-based connections, to help secure communication for the App-V Web Management Service.
segment.target: Provides helpful information about configuring certificates to support SSL-based connections, to help secure communication for the App-V Web Management Service.

segment.source: How to Install and Configure the App-V Management Console for a More Secure Environment
segment.target: How to Install and Configure the App-V Management Console for a More Secure Environment

segment.source: Provides a step-by-step procedure for connecting to an App-V Web Management Service by using a secure connection.
segment.target: Provides a step-by-step procedure for connecting to an App-V Web Management Service by using a secure connection.
